text.section: Each health spa doing business in the Commonwealth shall prepare a comprehensive list of all membership plans offered for sale by the health spa and the respective price of each plan. The list shall be shown to each prospective purchaser of a membership plan.
A health spa is prohibited from selling a membership plan not included in this list and in the registration statement required by KRS 367.905.

law.history: Created 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 298, sec. 4, effective July 15, 1982.
